org.dejava.component.util.validation

Class BasicValidations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dejava.component.util.validation.BasicValidations

  • public final class BasicValidations
extends java.lang.Object
    Some basic validations.

        Validates the maximum value of an object.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        maximumValue - Maximum value (included) for the object.
        Returns:

      • validateMinimumValue

        public static java.lang.Boolean validateMinimumValue(java.util.Date object,
                                     java.lang.Integer calendarField,
                                     java.lang.Integer amount)
        Validates the minimum value of an object. The minimum value will be evaluated adding the giving amount (for the given calendar field) to the current date.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be validated.
        calendarField - Calendar field to add the amount for the minimum value.
        amount - Amount (for the given calendar field) to be added to the current date to evaluate the minimum value.
        Returns:
        If the object has, at least, a minimum value.

      • validateMaximumValue

        public static java.lang.Boolean validateMaximumValue(java.util.Date object,
                                     java.lang.Integer calendarField,
                                     java.lang.Integer amount)
        Validates the maximum value of an object. The maximum value will be evaluated adding the giving amount (for the given calendar field) to the current date.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be validated.
        calendarField - Calendar field to add the amount for the maximum value.
        amount - Amount (for the given calendar field) to be added to the current date to evaluate the maximum value.
        Returns:
        If the object has, at most, a maximum value.

      • validateForbiddenWord

        public static java.lang.Boolean validateForbiddenWord(java.lang.String object,
                                      java.lang.String forbiddenWord,
                                      java.lang.Boolean asSequence)
        Validates if a text has the given forbidden word.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be validated.
        forbiddenWord - Word that is forbidden in the text.
        asSequence - If the forbidden word must be validated as a sequence of characters. If false, the word just must not be isolated in the text (between characters that are not letters or numbers).
        Returns:
        If a text has the given forbidden word.

      • validateForbiddenWords

        public static java.lang.Boolean validateForbiddenWords(java.lang.String object,
                                       java.lang.String forbiddenWords,
                                       java.lang.String splitRegEx,
                                       java.lang.Boolean asSequence)
        Validates if a text has any of the given forbidden words.
        Parameters:
        object - Object to be validated.
        forbiddenWords - Words that are forbidden in the text.
        splitRegEx - Regular expression to split the "forbidden words" string in several words.
        asSequence - If the forbidden word must be validated as a sequence of characters. If false, the word just must not be isolated in the text (between characters that are not letters or numbers).
        Returns:
        If a text has any of the given forbidden words.
